definition[0]: to claim that something is caused by a particular person, situation etc
example[0]: The report ascribes the rise in childhood asthma to the increase in pollution.
definition[1]: to claim that something has been written, said, made etc by a particular person
example[1]: a quotation thatâ€™s often been ascribed to Marilyn Monroe
definition[2]: to believe that something or someone has a particular quality
example[2]: Local people ascribe healing properties to this fruit.
